name: Longboard
description: A longboard is a type of surfboard that is typically 9 feet or longer in length. It is great for beginners and for riding long, slow-breaking waves.

name: Shortboard
description: A shortboard is a type of surfboard that is typically 6-8 feet in length. It is designed for more advanced surfers and for riding fast, steep waves.

name: Fish
description: A fish is a type of surfboard that is typically 5-7 feet in length. It is great for intermediate surfers and for riding small, fun waves.
